import axios from 'axios' import React,{useState} from 'react' const Login = () => { const[Email,setEmail]=useState('') const[Password,setPassword]=useState('') const LoginHandler = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() try { const res = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:1214/api/User/login',{Email,Password}) alert(res.data.Message) } catch (error) { alert(error.response.data.Message) } } return ( <>
